verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:6
verses.text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:7
verses.text: Consider what I say; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:8
verses.text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel:

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:9
verses.text: Wherein I suffer trouble, as an evil doer, even unto bonds; but the word of God is not bound.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:10
verses.text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect’s sakes, that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.
